questions.question: Considering the overall form and packaging, what is the primary shape of the presented product?

Observing the top of the container, what is the apparent color of its cap or lid?
What type of labeling is predominantly visible on the product's packaging?

What is the texture of the container, as indicated by its visible surface?

What is the most noticeable visual element, apart from text, found on the product's label?
